title: Theresa May – 2018 Press Conference Statement on Syria
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the press conference statement made by Theresa May, the Prime Minister, on 14 April 2018.

[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)

For the UK’s part four RAF Tornado GR 4’s launched storm shadow missiles at a military facility some 15 miles west of Homs, where the regime is assessed to keep chemical weapons in breach of Syria’s obligations under the Chemical Weapons Convention.
